rules_text:
This spell cost {2} less to cast for each modified land you control.
Fortified land has “{T}: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}. Spend this mana only on Fortifications.”
Awaken 3–{5}{G} [i](If you cast this spell for {5}{G}, also put three +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)[/i]
Fortify {3}
